title: Spam® Rolls

notes: Use with Quick Bread Dough recipe.
Prep time does not include Quick Bread Dough prep time.
These are a similar concept to Cinnamon Rolls, but with Spam®.

directions: Roll out dough into large rectangle on lightly floured surface until about 1/4-inch thick.
Coarsely grate Spam® onto dough, evenly coating.
(Optional) Sprinkle a little bit of onion powder over Spam®.
Carefully roll up rectangle, starting from a long size, into a cylinder.
Carefully slice cylinder into about 1-inch sections.
Place sections in greased 9x13 pan with edges touching.
Bake for 15–20 minutes or until tops are light brown.
(Optional) When tops are starting to brown, spread with butter and continue baking.
